name: Gobble-Tron
description:
You play as a turkey that has been subjected to experimentation by a group of scientists. 

They place a helmet on the Turkey which causes it to become smart, and thus escapes the laboratory. The weapons you use are made with scraps and gadgets from the lab, the primary weapon is a modified electromagnetic prototype rifle, and the secondary weapon is a cannon made out of a microwave and a toaster. Now you must survive from an endless waves of robots that are trying to send electromagnetic signals to your helmet, once they send enough it will cause it to short circuit and electrify you.

Keyboard and Mouse Controls: 

  • WASD - To move character.
  • Mouse Cursor - To aim.
  • Left Click - To shoot.
  • Num 2 - To switch weapons.
  • R - To restart the game.
  • Escape - To pause the game and see the menu or  quit the game when in the title screen.
  • Enter - To confirm menu selection or start the game when in the title screen.

Xbox Controller Controls: 

  • Left Analog Stick - To move character.
  • Right Analog Stick - To aim.
  • RT Button - To shoot.
  • Y Button - To switch weapons.
  • Menu Button - To pause the game and see the menu.
  • A Button - To confirm menu selection or start the game when in the title screen.
  • B Button - To quit the game when in the title screen.

Credits:

  • Alejandro Pérez Aybar - Programmer, Music Composer.
  • Alondra De Jesus - Programmer, Animator.
  • Bryan B. Bonilla Díaz - Sound Designer, Music Producer.
  • Antonio Berrios - Programmer.
  • Kevin Sosa - Programmer.
